Name: Lock Lock: Farm
About the game: Welcome to this NEW STYLE of minimalist puzzle game! With beautiful animals and scenery, have fun with various stages of varying difficulties. Clicking on the pillars, generate fences in order to guide or arrest the animals, and thus be able to capture them. Make sure you always use the least amount of fences possible. BE AGILE not to lose any animals. BE SMART, don't let animals fall into holes or be swallowed by predatory animals. Always keep an eye on the star! PREDICT the direction in which the animal will walk, and act in advance!
